sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react'; import star from "../../assets/star.svg" import "./index.css"; export default function MoviesCard({ movie }) { const { id, rank, title, description, genres, ratings, ranking, year, imdb_id, imdb_url, image_url, director, writer, duration, age_certification, } = movie; const formattedGenres = genres.replace(/\[|\]|'/g, '').replace(/\s*,\s*/g, ','); const getMoviesId = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) } return (
{title}
{year}
Genre: {formattedGenres}
Director: {director}
{ratings}
); }
